Post.title: Node - ECS
Post._content:
> [] ECS1512MB(28.8/0.72/GB)  
 []CentOS6.5 32  
 []Node + Express + Mongodb3.0.6  
 []OSX EI Capitan  

LinuxOSXsshWinputty

<!-- more -->

# 1.
rootIP

## 1.1 
`ssh root@[ip]`root  
`ssh root@110.12.32.12`  

## 1.2 FTP
`yum install vsftpd -v`  
`chkconfig vsftpd on`
*yum`ps -ef|grep yum`id`kill -9 id`*  

## 1.3 SFTP
FTPFileZila/WinSCPSSH

## 1.4 git
git  
`yum remove git`  
github  
```bash
cd /usr/local/src
wget https://github.com/git/git/archive/master.zip
unzip master.zip
#
cd /usr/local/src/git-master
make configure
./configure --prefix=/usr/bin
make
make install
#
\cp -fr /usr/local/src/git-master/git /usr/bin
git --version
```
error
```bash
#makezilb
yum install zlib-devel -y
#git clone httpshttps
yum install curl-devel
cd /usr/local/src/git-master 
./configure
make
make install
```

# 2.Node
nvmnode[http://fengmk2.com/blog/2014/03/node-env-and-faster-npm.html](http://fengmk2.com/blog/2014/03/node-env-and-faster-npm.html)    

sshnvm use
```bash
#
nvm use 4.1.2
nvm alias default 4.1.2
```

# 3.Mongodb
```bash
#32i68632  
wget https://fastdl.mongodb.org/linux/mongodb-linux-i686-3.0.6.tgz
tar -zxvf mongodb-linux-i686-3.0.6.tgz

#
mv mongodb-linux-i686-3.0.6 /usr/local/mongodb

#
mkdir -p /app/mongodb/db
mkdir -p /app/mongodb/logs

#mongodb.conf
cd /usr/local/mongodb/bin
vi mongodb.conf
# START#
dbpath = /app/mongodb/db #  
logpath = /app/mongodb/logs/mongodb.log #  
port = 27017  #  
fork = true  #  
nohttpinterface = true  
#auth = true  #
# END#

#
/usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongod --config /usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongodb.conf
#mongodb
/usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongo

#
ps -ef | grep mongodb #mongodbid
kill -15 id
/usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongod --config /usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongodb.conf
```

```bash
#mongo
use admin
db.createUser({user:'admin',pwd:'admin',roles:[{role:'userAdminAnyDatabase',db:'admin'},{role:'readWriteAnyDatabase',db:'admin'}]})
#configauth=truemongodb
```

>  
>mongoHub   mongodb3.0+  
>Robomongo  mongodb3.0+

# 4.Node
## 4.1 Git
```bash
git clone https://github.com/xxx/xxx.git
cd xxx
node app.js
```

## 4.2 forever
sshnodeforever  
```bash
#forever
npm install -g forever
forever start app.js

#
forever stop app.js     #
forever list    #
forever -w start app.js     #
```

## 4.3 Upstart
Vagrant  
```bash
#
yum install upstart
#/etc/init
touch /etc/init/mynode.conf
```

`mynode.conf`
```bash
#upstart
author "lenrinfvck"
description "mynode"

#start on (local-filesystems and net-device-up IFACE=eh0)
start on startup
stop on shutdown
respawn  
#env NODE_ENV=production  
#nodenvmPATHnvm
exec /var/gitclone/nvm/versions/node/v4.1.2/bin/node /www/app.js 
```

`mymongodb.conf`
```bash
description "lrfmad-mongodb"
author "lenrinfvck"
limit nofile 20000 20000
kill timeout 300
respawn
respawn limit 2 5
start on runlevel [2345]
stop on runlevel [06]
exec  /usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongod --config /usr/local/mongodb/bin/mongodb.conf
```

Upstart  
`start mynode``start mymongodb`  
>\>mynode start/running, process 6770  

**

# 4.Node

## 4.2 forever

## 4.3 Upstart

`mynode.conf`

```bash
start on startup
stop on shutdown
```

`mymongodb.conf`

Post.title: vagrantCentOS6LAMP
Post._content:
>vagrant[vagrant](https://github.com/lenrinfvck/ntrf-doc/blob/master/%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83%E5%8F%8A%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7/Vagrant%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8.md)

virtual+vagrantcentosLAMP.  
centos.box[http://www.vagrantbox.es/](http://www.vagrantbox.es/) 

>
>LINUX: centOS6.4 i386 Minimal

<!-- more -->

# 
## (1)803306
  
>/etc/sysconfig/iptables  

vifilezila  
    
    -A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT  
    -A INPUT -m state --state NEW -m tcp -p tcp --dport 3306 -j ACCEPT  

 `$ /etc/init.d/iptables restart`
## (2)SELINUX
  
>/etc/selinux/config  

    #SELINUX=enforcing //
    #SELINUXTYPE=targeted //
    SELINUX=disabled //

`shutdown -r now`  

# LAMP
## (1)Apache
    yum install httpd  

y  
Apache `/etc/init.d/http start`  
 `chkconfig httpd on `

## (2)MySQL
###   

Y,    
```bash
yum install mysql mysql-server
```
MySQL  
```bash
/etc/init.d/mysqld start  
```
  
```bash
chkconfig mysqld on
```
/etcmy.cnf  
```bash    
cp /usr/share/mysql/my-medium.cnf /etc/my.cnf  
```
### root

```bash
mysql_secure_installation  
#Y()  
#2  
#Y  
#Thanks for using MySQL!  
```

MySql MySQL
```bash
/etc/init.d/mysqld restart  #
/etc/init.d/mysqld stop  #
/etc/init.d/mysqld start  #
```
## (3)PHP5 
### php5
```bash
yum install php  
```
Y  

### PHP PHP5  MySQL
```bash
yum install php-mysql php-gd libjpeg* php-imap php-ldap php-odbc php-pear php-xml php-xmlrpc php-mbstring php-mcrypt php-bcmath php-mhash libmcrypt
```

  
Y  
```bash
/etc/init.d/mysqld restart #MySql  
/etc/init.d/httpd restart #Apche  
```

### php-5.5
 php-common
```bash
yum -y remove php-common
```

```bash
rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el6/latest.rpm
```
 php  php 
```bash
yum install php55w php55w-cli php55w-common php55w-gd php55w-ldap php55w-mbstring php55w-mcrypt php55w-mysql php55w-pdo php55w-pecl-memcache php55w-devel php55w-xml php55w-xmlrpc php55w-opcache

/etc/init.d/httpd restart #Apche
php -v # 
```
# 
## (1)Apache

>/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf  

+ **/var/www/html**  
    vagrant`/vagrant``chown apache.apache -R /var/www/html`

+ **ServerTokens OS**  
44 ServerTokens Prod   
    
+ **ServerSignature On**  
536 ServerSignature Off Apache  
    
+ **Options Indexes FollowSymLinks**  
331 Options Includes ExecCGI  
FollowSymLinksCGISSI  
    
+ **#AddHandler cgi-script .cgi**  
796 AddHandler cgi-script .cgi .pl .plCGI
    
+ **AllowOverride None**   
338 AllowOverride All .htaccess  
    
+ **AddDefaultCharset UTF-8**  
759 AddDefaultCharset GB2312GB2312  
    
+ **Options Indexes MultiViews FollowSymLinks**  
554  Options MultiViews FollowSymLinks
    
+ **DirectoryIndex index.html index.html.var**  
402 DirectoryIndex index.html index.htm Default.html Default.htm
    
+ **index.php Default.php index.html.var**  
index.php  
    
+ **KeepAlive Off**  
76 KeepAlive On   
    
+ **MaxKeepAliveRequests 100**  
83 MaxKeepAliveRequests 1000   
```bash
/etc/init.d/httpd restart #  
rm -f /etc/httpd/conf.d/welcome.conf /var/www/error/noindex.html #
```

## (2)PHP


>/etc/php.ini  

+ **date.timezone = PRC**  
946 date.timezone = PRC  

+ **expose_php = Off**  
432 php  

+ **magic_quotes_gpc = On**  
745 magic_quotes_gpcSQL  

+ **short_open_tag = ON**  
229php


# 
## (1)Apache

>/etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf  

+ **/var/www/html**  
    vagrant`/vagrant``chown apache.apache -R /var/www/html`

+ **ServerTokens OS**  
44 ServerTokens Prod   
    
+ **ServerSignature On**  
536 ServerSignature Off Apache  
    
+ **Options Indexes FollowSymLinks**  
331 Options Includes ExecCGI  
FollowSymLinksCGISSI  
    
+ **#AddHandler cgi-script .cgi**  
796 AddHandler cgi-script .cgi .pl .plCGI
    
+ **AllowOverride None**   
338 AllowOverride All .htaccess  
    
+ **AddDefaultCharset UTF-8**  
759 AddDefaultCharset GB2312GB2312  
    
+ **Options Indexes MultiViews FollowSymLinks**  
554  Options MultiViews FollowSymLinks
    
+ **DirectoryIndex index.html index.html.var**  
402 DirectoryIndex index.html index.htm Default.html Default.htm
    
+ **index.php Default.php index.html.var**  
index.php  
    
+ **KeepAlive Off**  
76 KeepAlive On   
    
+ **MaxKeepAliveRequests 100**  
83 MaxKeepAliveRequests 1000

```bash
/etc/init.d/httpd restart #
```
